Name: Cindy
Dialogue: Hey Boss, Holmgang's preped for launch.

Name: Cindy
Dialogue: Yes, yes it does Boss. Please try to bring it back in working order.

Name: Boss
Dialogue: Don't worry, I'll be sure to wipe my shoes before I get in the 30 ton mech

Name: Cindy
Dialogue: Just try to avoid too much damage.

Name: Boss
Dialogue: Well, the Queen's Knights are infamous for their generosity.

Name: Boss
Dialogue: I'm sure all the damage I'll receive is a slap on the hand and some harsh words.
